lenders.name: Edie

By paying it forward we will eventually take care of ourselves as a gender.

lenders.name: Chandra
lenders.loan_because: After spending time in and enjoying the culture and people in both Mexico and Peru, I have been looking for an organization like this.  Offering this support makes an immediate impact in someone's quality of life.  It allows children to remain in school and gives their parents the opportunity to experience a sense of accomplishment in their trade.  Having the ability to support your family strengthens people's feeling of pride and hope for their future.  This cooperative is a fantastic idea!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am back in school getting my third degree - this one in Outdoor Recreation Leadership with a minor in Spanish so that I may share with many my curiosity and drive for self-empowerment through the outdoors.

I love to be in service to others, both by giving my time and financial support, if needed.  I spend every moment I can trying to improve the world inch by inch - by my actions, my choices and my words.

lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a forester and I plan the maintenace and care of forests for private land owners.  This requires an understanding of all of the impacts a forest has on the other plants, animals and people that are asociated with the forest.  It requires a long term outlook and it takes many years to see the results of your work.

Our forests grow slowly in Canada but I have been doing this work for 30 years and am now seeing satisfying results.

lenders.name: Raymond

lenders.occupational_info: I am a long time worker in information technology and I help design and build computer systems and networks.

lenders.name: Frahm
lenders.occupational_info: Our family works with low income elderly and IT services for State Government.

lenders.name: Herve
lenders.loan_because: The money provides immediate help to someone who is enterprising but in need. It also makes me feel good to be able to contribute in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an educational institution. Students who have complaints about any aspect of their student life can come to my office for help.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: to give is a privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: I study antibiotic resistant bacteria that transmit between people and animals.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because:
I think this is one of the most extraordinary organizations I ever ran into that helps funding real people with real needs. Every year I like to help who is in need in the world, and in my own city as much as I can afford, but I think this is the new way, and best way to give directly to someone and their family a better hope and a better future.
Good luck to all the small business in the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time Architect in Residential housing, and I also get to build my own projects when feasable.

lenders.name: Corrie
lenders.loan_because: It's all about creating jobs....
lenders.occupational_info: I work for IFC - an international organization investing in companies in developing countries.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Progress happens when we help each other in some direct, tangible way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am starting a bakery from scratch.

lenders.name: Ginger & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: We were able to start a biofuel business in NH called Simply Green this year thanks to a loan from a friend so we want to pay it forward and make difference for others whom are eager to work hard and start a business of their own.
lenders.occupational_info: Biofuel is soy based oil to fuel cars, homes, and businesses.  Its a great product to use in order to help the environment and decrease emmisions.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: it could change lives for the better
lenders.occupational_info: Private and International Banking

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in something that helps them support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to junior high students in Chandler, Arizona.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: even a small difference is a difference!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: it's just such a no-brainer: sacrificing a small amount of interest results in empowering hard-working people around the world to make a better life for themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an engineer.

lenders.name: Nizam
lenders.loan_because: I have 235644 sq.ft.land in hart of city of Satara (M.S.) India.I have no funds for develop this land.Now I am working in outdoor Advertising field, but I want to develop my land as a comercial & residencial complex or other profit making business.
lenders.occupational_info: I know world is very short now by way of internet so that I try my efforts.

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.occupational_info: Founder of CPAS (Community Partnership of Akuapim South), an NGO in Ghana. We are a community development organization focusing on microfinance and education.

lenders.name: Lisa French
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to educate and prepare young people for personal and career success in a dynamic, global community.

lenders.name: Joy and Jason
lenders.loan_because:
I wish to support positive change in the world.

I wish to give a hand to those who are trying their best and just need a little help.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a force for good in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Ministry

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: A small effort for me can make a huge difference for others! I know how hard it is to get money to start our business and I'm glad I can help others with this!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a computer service company, i repair computers, build webpages, supervise computer networks from some companies, and other comuter tech stuff :)

lenders.name: Bergman family
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is what we are called to do.

lenders.name: eve
lenders.loan_because: I hope that it helps someone have a better life, everyone deserves it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom to a one year old.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing for me to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix airplanes.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: ... because I can, and because someone did something nice for me when it mattered. I know what it can mean.

lenders.name: NANJ
lenders.loan_because: I believe...I can...I will.
lenders.occupational_info: Artist/Photographer/Writer

lenders.name: Renan
lenders.loan_because: I am a father of two children and currently needing to re-start my business. Due to the loss of the only one account I had, my family currently is surviving by a loan I got two months ago - loan which is ending. Once I am able to travel again and feed my family, I will be able to be back in business. I need to loan US$ 2,500.00
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an export agent, selling leathers made in Brazil to several countries in the world. 
I have my own company, and my job consists in contacting importers in foreign countries that are looking for raw material for their factories - shoe, furniture, leather goods factories.

lenders.name: Annetta
lenders.loan_because: There is a need.

lenders.name: howard and maureen
lenders.loan_because: Because it's a perfect example of what capitalism could be if more average Joes could get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: as my retirement job as a singer I entertain senior groups in the SF bay area and as of 1/1/8 use the proceeds from that job to finance these loans

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to, when I who live in a society of plenty gets to give to others in a way that will empower them, I should obviously do this. I do this because Christ has commanded me to care for the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a religion major currently, making my way through college.

lenders.name: Support Staff MoneyGram
lenders.loan_because: We should support each other
lenders.occupational_info: MoneyGram International is a company that provides affordable, reliable and convenient payment services to people and businesses world wide.  In other words, MoneyGram helps people send money.  Our team helps the call center make sure that happens as quickly and effeciently as possible.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English Educator in Dayton Ohio.

lenders.name: The  Blais family
lenders.loan_because: We belive in LOVE.
lenders.occupational_info: -piece of art

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: It is an affordable way to make each person's life better.  As their lives get better, so do the lives of those they love, work, and live with.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate medical classes for low-income people in America so they can get jobs.

lenders.name: jantzie
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women owned businesses around the world.

lenders.name: James Ray International
lenders.loan_because: we believe that the ability to both give and receive graciously is one of the greatest gifts a person can possess.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people create wealth and harmony in all areas of their lives: financially, relationally, mentally, physically, and spiritually.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to this activity by a friend.  Sometimes one thinks that a single person can't make a difference.  Here, it seems, one person CAN make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a guy.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate and do it in a more tangible way.

lenders.name: Demetra
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enought to be given opportunities that I took full advantage of and now I am in a possition to be able to do the same.  I believe in "paying it forward"

lenders.name: Speed and Trixie
lenders.loan_because: No eternal reward will forgive us now for wasting the dawn.

lenders.name: gerald
lenders.loan_because: something i can do to improve the world
lenders.occupational_info: evaluate whether what my company does is improving things or not

lenders.name: Raychel
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and it makes me feel good to help someone out - I admire their entreprenurial spirit!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for SC Johnson and work on the Walmart supply chain team

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it is good to help others.

lenders.name: Deer Valley Lodging
lenders.loan_because: We, at Deer Valley Lodging group Sales have decided to donate money for good cause instead of doing exchange gifts for our Christmas party. We figured that we don't really need any thing so it would be much better to use the money by helping people in need. Kiva gave us the opportunity to share our blessings to the rest of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We book groups (conferences, conventions, trainings, seminars) in our hotel properties here in Park City, UT.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of making a "loan" to people who are just looking for a chance to improve their lives and the people around them.  They all appear to be hard working people and just need a chance.

Providing help like this is such a simple thing to do.

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Meme Jo
lenders.loan_because: I can .....and we all need to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: For the company I work for , I take care of reminding clients that they forgot to pay their bills and help them make the arrangements to make sure they pay on time.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: Loaning even a little bit can make such a difference.  Helping even in a tangential way in some of Google's work in the Africa region inspired me to want to help entrepreneurs in the region in other ways.
lenders.occupational_info: Technical troubleshooting for online display advertising products

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a change.
lenders.occupational_info: I give support to business on events, communication and business support.

lenders.name: Marieta
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Chris Wang
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, not matter how big or small on this earth.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a board member of the Berkeley-Albany YMCA PG&E Teen Center and a member of the Berkeley-Albany YMCA Teen Task Force, as well. 

http://ymcateentaskforce.blogspot.com/

lenders.name: Paul & Aislinn Beedu
lenders.loan_because: We can do it.  We can improve the lives of others.  We can make a difference...   Most of all, it makes us feel GREAT!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Network Engineer for a mobile phone company in the USA.  My better half is in FINANCE.  We also launching a Real Estate Investment and Property Management Company.

lenders.name: Fereshteh
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Alhassan
lenders.loan_because: there is a lot of problem involve organizing a vehicle for visitors on a tour.
lenders.occupational_info: working to render service to tourist in ghana

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva certificate for Christmas.  Probably the most thoughtful gift I could receive.  Hopefully I will be lending for a very long time
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employeed.

lenders.name: Stacie
lenders.loan_because: What a great feeling to help out a complete stranger. My dad got me started with a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas, and I'm so glad he did!

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: To  make a difference in the lives of people.  It isn't how long you live on this earth that makes a difference.  It is the difference you  make on this earth with the time you are given to live.

lenders.name: Mehul
lenders.loan_because: it will help someone else survive and emerge as a stronger human being
lenders.occupational_info: No matter where you are, everyday comes with its unique challenges. Those who face them with "indomitable will", will SURVIVE. Thats what I do every single day, face my challenges with a smile on my face and determination in my mind.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.occupation: Part time Documentary Film Maker---Full Time Lover

lenders.name: Dr. Roshan
lenders.loan_because: I know my parents came from over from India with little or no money and then raised themselves up to create a better life for their children and I feel that I am very fortunate to be raised the way that I was.  I want to transcend those values through loaning money to those who have their eyes set up creating a better life for themselves along with the next generation.  And for that, I loan.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupation: Director of Finance and Human Resources
lenders.loan_because: "What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.” Albert Pike
lenders.occupational_info: Manage the accounting department and employee benefits

lenders.name: Mattie
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together -
lenders.occupational_info: I am a second grade teacher during our fall, winter, and spring. In the summers I am a professional mountain guide teaching rock and ice climbing.

lenders.name: Jill/John/Matt/Zac
lenders.loan_because: We feel strongly that each individual should be able to pursue their own dreams.  We are proud to be a part of that process.
lenders.occupational_info: John and Jill make music with individuals who are visually and often emotionally disabled.  Through making music, one can transcend the typical obstacles found with communicative disorders, and bring about a sense of well-being.  Zachary and Matthew are students in the local school, studying math, literature, science, art, music and geography.  They enjoy making music, playing soccer and laughing together.

lenders.name: Glynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving. Many have given to me,  I feel blessed to give in return!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very busy hospital, in the emergency department.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It only takes a little to make a positive change in someone elses life!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an e-commerce company
